ygData.subject: RE: Bones, bones bones...
ygData.msgSnippet: ahhh Good. a good thing to have been misinformed about :) how much for the bridge? :) stone or wood? ... From: Barry Senowitz [mailto:BarryS@mobiusg.com] Sent:
ygData.messageBody:
ahhh Good. a good thing to have been misinformed about :)
how much for the bridge? :) stone or wood?


-----Original Message-----
From: Barry Senowitz [mailto:BarryS@...]
Sent: Friday, December 03, 1999 1:56 PM
To: 'EQ_Necromancer@onelist.com'
Subject: RE: [EQ_Necromancer] Bones, bones bones...


thats a good one, 5 bone chips per cast. by the way I have a bridge in S
Karana I want to sell you too : )

All pets take 2 bone chips to cast.

Also, every now and then someone states that warbone chips make a stronger
pet, but they don't do anything as far as your pet goes.

Vanelin Blackheart
34th DE Nec - Povar


-----Original Message-----
From: Christopher King [mailto:CKing@...]
Sent: Friday, December 03, 1999 1:47 PM
To: 'EQ_Necromancer@onelist.com'
Subject: [EQ_Necromancer] Bones, bones bones...


ok.. call me silly:

Up till now (lev 16 jsut last night) I have been bonecollecting by huniting.
I like the self sufficient feeling it gives me!
But if I read correctly the 16th lev pet uses 5 bones per cast! that will be
hard to harvest. So time to buy. It never occurred to me before, but ARE
there vendors who sell bone chips in quantity? At the guild maybe? I have
only seen single chips on vendors out in the fields and such...

thx :)
<blushes>
Stricken
Gnome, Vallon Zek
